text: Mary Angela "Angie" Barnett (born September 25, 1950) is an American (born in British CyprusANGIE BOWIE â€“ BIOGRAPHY . angiebowie.net) model, actress, writer and media personality. She is well-known for being the wife of David Bowie from 1970 until 1980. During the 1970s, she made frequent appearances on talk shows. She has also acted in several television shows and had a career in music. Recently, Barnett has become a journalist.Angie Bowie in Frock Magazine. Angie and David a child, Duncan. After she split from David, she let him have full custody of their son and is now estranged (not in contact) with her son. In 2016, she made an appearance on the British reality show Celebrity Big Brother. While on the show, she found out that David Bowie had died. She told Tiffany Pollard, who mistakenly thought that Angie had told her David Gest (who was also on the show) had died.
